description: This file defines an investment report generation workflow using AI agents, including classes and methods for analyzing stock data, ranking companies, and producing investment recommendations. It also contains script logic for executing the workflow with user input.

classes.name: InvestmentReportGenerator
classes.description: A workflow class that orchestrates AI agents to generate comprehensive investment analysis and strategic recommendations.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes the investment report workflow for given company symbols, producing sequential responses including stock analysis, ranking, and investment proposals.
